actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that certain annuity payments made pursuant to the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be fixed at the nearest penny.

summary.text: Directs that specified annuity payments made pursuant to the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be fixed at the nearest cent.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain annuity payments made pursuant to the Civil Service Retirement Act shall be fixed at the nearest penny.
